devdoc.details: This is a naive implementation which pushes all validation to the underlying. No staleness checks are possible This oracle should not be used for regular Chainlink Data Feeds

atVersion(uint256).details: Converts the passed in version to a roundID by adding _versionOffset

params.version: The version of which to lookup

params.versionOffset_: Version offset from source round ID

returns._0: The current oracle version after sync

_decimalOffset.details: Decimal offset used to normalize chainlink price to 18 decimals

_versionOffset.details: Which underlying round to consider version 0: version = roundId - _versionOffset

feed.details: Chainlink price feed to read from

devdoc.title: ReservoirFeedOracle

sync().notice: Checks for a new price. Does not perform staleness validation as the underlying oracle does not support this.

userdoc.notice: Reservoir implementation of the IOracle interface, using Reservoir's AggregatorV3Interface adaptors
